name: LumberJack (shadow00dev, Melting Brain Studios, HalfBolt Games)
name_original: LumberJack (shadow00dev, Melting Brain Studios, HalfBolt Games)
description:
Meet Jack, can you guess what he does for a living? Chop down trees and rebuild them as ladders in this neat little arcade game. If you can build enough ladders and get to a high enough floor, your axe has a chance to get an upgrade. Duck under Winged-Beasts, jump over Bluehogs, and Jump onto Turtlesaurs to use their shell as a means of offence, referred to as “The Turtlesaur-Trap” it’ll destroy anything it touches, except you. Good luck!

Credits:

Original Concept/Graphics: Andrew George - https://melting-brain-studios.itch.io/

 Music/Sound FX: Tyler Waite - https://halfbolt.itch.io/

Programming/Controls: shadow00dev - https://shadow00dev.itch.io/
